characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a green car, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Initially, there is a pedestrian on the left side of the road. As the vehicle progresses, a black sedan from the adjacent left lane moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. Additionally, a green car and a motorcyclist are visible in the distance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while navigating through urban traffic. The vehicle is likely to decelerate due to the black sedan cutting into its lane from the left side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A pedestrian, approximately 10 meters away, walking towards the road. 2) Left side: A black sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane. 3) Front: A green car, approximately 20 meters away, driving straight. 4) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 25 meters away, driving straight.
